item.title: Patch
item.description: When our stars c o l l i d e Life is what it should be. Orbits surround us. Her Orbits surround me. Dance. Whimsical. Within. Me. Something in her air Strikes me true. Embracing I m a g I n a t I o n. Circling now â€¦ Something in here. Prickling. Stickling. Picking. Sight for a sore soul.
